articles.title: New Hampshire to get view of total lunar eclipse Sunday night, if weather cooperates - WMUR Manchester
articles.description: Many eyes will be on the moon Sunday night for a total lunar eclipse that will be visible in New Hampshire and across North America.
articles.content:
MANCHESTER, N.H. —Many eyes will be on the moon Sunday night for a total lunar eclipse that will be visible in New Hampshire and across North America.

articles.description: Americans are shopping and buying and "they're paying their loans, at least to Affirm quite well," Affirm's Max Levchin said Thursday evening.
articles.content:
